english.segment1: Waiting for a sign that never came. Waiting, pinching nerves to stay sane. Can't erase the time, forget the past. Knowing good times come and go so fast
english.segment2: Denise it's not all set back in time. Denise just lay it down and you'll find. You've changed
english.segment3: Nowhere girl, a cage you've come to know. Still wondering, "Where did they all go?". Plan a recluse life down to the day. While you have chains to lose. And a whole world to gain
english.segment4: Denise, Denise it's time. Time to seize the world. Denise it's time
english.segment5: Denise it's not all set down in stone. Denise just lay it down and you're home. You've changed
